title: Is my Pixel 3A XL 4g compatible or not?
content:
I received an email from AT&T that they're dropping 3g and that my phone won't work anymore when that happens. I thought my Pixel 3A XL was 4g compatible. I came across a suggestion to switch to 4g in the Settings - Network & Internet - Mobile Network - Preferred Network type. I only can switch from 3g to LTE, there is no 4g to chose from.
Am I screwed?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
